title: New: Three Fields – Isolator
content:
Artwork by Jessica Bialkowski

As an individual who writes about music, I try to keep the whole affair as far from self-indulgence as possible. It’s times like this however, where I feel the need to digress into my not actually that interesting existence. Currently I’m in a diazepam induced daze, it’s 4am and despite the mass amounts of painkiller I’m on to combat the trapped tendon in my neck, I can’t fucking sleep.

So thank god for Three Fields, a Birmingham based ambient producer that manages to find a way of making all problems disappear through the subtlest of techniques.  The track is the first cut to drop after his recent release Wild Blue Yonder. It’s full of blissful open spaces, transporting but never directing to a specific location.

Stream the track below and check out more of his work over at his soundcloud.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
